SEARCH
Package gw.api.policy

Interface PolicyFinder

public interface PolicyFinder
Provides methods for finding Policy entities.

    Description

  • Field Details

    • EARLIEST_CREATED_FIRST

      static final Comparator<Editable> EARLIEST_CREATED_FIRST

  • Method Details

    • findPolicyPeriod

      PolicyPeriod findPolicyPeriod(Policy policy, PolicyPeriodType periodType, IEntityPropertyInfo[] periodColumns)
      Searches for a PolicyPeriod matching the specified type, and having the same policy type and matching values for the indicated columns as the indicated policy.
      Parameters:
      policy - The Policy object whose type and columns will be used to match the policy period
      periodType - required type for the policy period to be returned
      periodColumns - the required columns on which to match the indicated policy to existing policy periods
      Returns:
      the matching policy period or NULL if no period matches

    • getPolicyPeriods

      PolicyPeriod[] getPolicyPeriods(Policy policy)
      Returns the PolicyPeriods associated with the given Policy. Returns an empty array if none exist or the Policy has a temporary id.
      Parameters:
      policy - a Policy

    • getAggregateLimits

      AggregateLimit[] getAggregateLimits(CoverageLine line)
      Returns the AggregateLimits associated with the given CoverageLine. Returns an empty array if none exist.
      Parameters:
      line - a CoverageLine

    • getCoverageLines

      CoverageLine[] getCoverageLines(Coverage coverage)
      Returns the CoverageLine associated with the given coverage. Returns an empty array if none exist or the coverage has a temporary id.
      Parameters:
      coverage - a Coverage

    • findPolicy

      Policy findPolicy(PolicySummary policySummary) throws com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotFoundException, com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotUniqueException
      Retrieves a single Policy entity from the external adapter.
      Parameters:
      policySummary - A PolicySummary entity (usually selected by the user). The information contained in this PolicySummary object will be used to retrieve the appropriate Policy
      Returns:
      a Policy object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the policyNumber is null or empty or the effective date is null.
      com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotFoundException - If the Policy was not found.
      com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotUniqueException - If more than one Policy was found.
      com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLDataConversionException

    • findPolicy

      Policy findPolicy(Policy policy) throws com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotFoundException, com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotUniqueException
      Retrieves a single Policy entity from the external adapter.
      Parameters:
      policy - A Policy entity currently in the ClaimCenter system. The information contained in this Policy object will be used to retrieve the appropriate Policy. This version is typically used to refresh a previously retrieved Policy entity.
      Returns:
      a Policy object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the policyNumber is null or empty or the effective date is null.
      com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotFoundException - If the Policy was not found.
      com.guidewire.cc.domain.policy.impl.PolicyNotUniqueException - If more than one Policy was found.
      com.guidewire.pl.system.webservices.XMLDataConversionException

    • findPolicySummaries

      IQueryBeanResult<PolicySummary> findPolicySummaries(PolicySearchCriteria criteria)
      Executes the Policy search with the specified criteria. At least one of the fields in the criteria object must be non-null.
      Parameters:
      criteria - a PolicySearchCriteria object containing the search criteria.
      Returns:
      QueryProcessor object containing set of PolicySummary entities matching the criteria.
